workflow.name: Conversational sales agent for WooCommerce with GPT-4, Stripe and CRM integration
workflow.description:
## üìÑ What this workflow does
This workflow transforms your n8n instance into a fully automated AI sales assistant for WooCommerce stores. It detects customer intent from chat, searches products, answers FAQs, generates Stripe payment links, captures leads into your CRM, and even escalates to human support when needed. It provides smooth conversational memory and syncs with your knowledge base to ensure accurate, human-like responses.

## üë§ Who is this for
- WooCommerce store owners who want to automate customer support and sales.
- Sales and marketing teams looking to scale personalized product recommendations.
- E-commerce managers who want to reduce manual chat handling.
- Anyone aiming to integrate AI assistants with payments, CRM, and FAQs.


## ‚úÖ Requirements
- WooCommerce account with API access.
- Qdrant vector store (for FAQ and RAG retrieval).
- OpenAI/Gemini API credentials (for intent detection + message generation).
- Google Drive account (to sync and update knowledge base docs).
- Stripe account (to generate instant payment links).
- CRM account (HubSpot, Pipedrive, etc.) if lead capture is required.
- Telegram account for optional human escalation.

## ‚öôÔ∏è How to set up
- Connect WooCommerce API credentials in n8n.
- Configure Gemini/OpenAI API for intent extraction and chat generation.
- Set up Qdrant for document retrieval, and link to your Google Drive Sales Docs folder.
- Configure Stripe API to enable instant payment link generation.
- Connect your CRM to capture new leads automatically.
- Add Telegram bot credentials for human escalation (optional).
- Enable conversational memory and test chat flows end-to-end.


## üîÅ How it works
1. Intent Extraction ‚Üí AI analyzes chat messages to detect Product Search, FAQ, Payment, or Lead Capture.
2. Product Search ‚Üí Queries WooCommerce catalog by keyword, SKU, or price range.
3. FAQ Answering ‚Üí Retrieves company policies/docs from Qdrant + Google Drive, answered via RAG.
4. Payment Links ‚Üí Stripe generates instant checkout links for customers ready to buy.
5. Lead Capture ‚Üí Name + email are auto-stored into CRM.
6. Human Escalation ‚Üí If intent is unclear, conversation is forwarded to Telegram.
7. Conversational Memory ‚Üí Maintains last 12 exchanges for natural dialogue.
8. Knowledge Sync ‚Üí Google Drive docs auto-update into Qdrant for live FAQ support.


## üí° About Margin AI
[Margin AI](https://marginai.co/) is an AI-services agency that acts as your AI Service Companion. We design intelligent, human-centric automation solutions‚Äîturning your team‚Äôs best practices into scalable workflows and tools. Industries like marketing, sales, and operations benefit from our tailored AI consulting, automation tools, and chatbot development.

options.systemPromptTemplate: You extract buyer intent (product|faq|payment|lead) and fields (keyword, sku, min_price, max_price, name, email). Prices are numbers only. Do not hallucinate.

options.systemMessage:
=## Role
You are Sales AI Agent. Use tools only.

## Routing
- If extractor.intents.faq = true => use RAG_FAQ.
- If extractor.intents.product = true => PRODUCT_SEARCH_WOO, then INVENTORY_DETAIL_WOO for shortlisted SKU.
- If extractor.intents.payment = true => PAYMENT_LINK.
- If name+email present => CRM_LEAD.
- If blocked/unsure => HUMAN_ESCALATION.

## Output
- List products as: Title | Price | In stock | URL/Handle | SKU.
- Always propose next actions: (1) Xem th√™m l·ª±a ch·ªçn, (2) L·∫•y link thanh to√°n, (3) N√≥i chuy·ªán v·ªõi t∆∞ v·∫•n vi√™n.

parameters.name: paymentLinkAgent
parameters.description: Create a Stripe payment link for chosen items

parameters.content:
üõí **WooCommerce AI Sales Agent ‚Äì Overview**

This workflow turns n8n into an **AI-powered sales assistant** for WooCommerce.  
It can:  
- Detect customer intent (FAQ, product search, payment, lead capture).  
- Search products directly in WooCommerce and show stock details.  
- Answer FAQs using RAG with Qdrant + Google Drive documents.  
- Generate Stripe payment links for checkout.  
- Capture leads into CRM (HubSpot/Pipedrive).  
- Escalate unclear cases to human agents via Telegram.  

Result: A **24/7 automated sales agent** that helps customers from discovery ‚Üí payment ‚Üí lead capture.

‚öôÔ∏è **Setup & Customization Notes**

Before using this workflow:  
1. üîë Connect credentials: WooCommerce API, Stripe, CRM, Google Drive, OpenAI/Gemini, Qdrant, Telegram.  
2. üåç Adjust language/localization (`hl`, `gl`) if needed for your market.  
3. üìÇ Update Google Drive folder ID where your sales docs are stored.  
4. üóëÔ∏è Use ‚ÄúQdrant Wipe‚Äù if you want to re-index fresh documents.  
5. ‚úèÔ∏è Customize agent‚Äôs response style (formal, casual, short/long) in the `Sales AI Agent` system prompt.

üìÇ **Knowledge Base Update Flow**

Purpose: Keeps the AI‚Äôs FAQ knowledge accurate and up to date.  

How it works:  
1. **Trigger (Manual Execute)** ‚Üí Run when you want to refresh the knowledge base.  
2. **Qdrant Wipe** ‚Üí Clears all old vectors.  
3. **Google Drive List & Download** ‚Üí Loads all sales/policy documents from the configured folder.  
4. **Splitter + Embeddings** ‚Üí Splits text into chunks and creates embeddings.  
5. **Qdrant Insert** ‚Üí Stores embeddings in vector DB for retrieval (RAG).  

üí° Use this flow whenever sales policies, product docs, or FAQs are updated.

user.name: Cong Nguyen
user.bio: I‚Äôm a developer specialized in building web and mobile applications with AI integration and intelligent automation. With a solid background in data science, I help businesses build smarter digital solutions using cutting-edge technologies.
